response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. It's a unique and highly sought-after item that has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. Given its exceptional value and benefits, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you, we propose a price of $11,000 for this product. We are confident that this offer presents a fair balance between the value provided and the cost to you. Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to ask. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 11000}
